title: looking for adc or group of people to join in ranked with (S2 last season)
body:
Im Bronze 1 right now (8/2 in promos sucks right?) and i main support. want to join a group of people for ranked.

My winrate on support right now is like 60% so im playing really well but its great to have a good adc to play with. i have skype and curse too. :P
Champs i play proficiently: blitz annie soraka thresh naut

Add me: XPitchPleaseX
